name: ./Gray/Projects/
body:
# Welcome to Gray's Page.

## Contact  Info
> [Gray's LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/pub/guangyu-gray-wang/48/6ab/101)  
Phone: +1 (226) 988-3558  
Email: guangyu.wangg@yahoo.com


## Personal Projects

### Nummy!
![](http://i.imgur.com/TMz61t2.gif)
![](http://i.imgur.com/jxsqM65.gif)
![](http://i.imgur.com/SzUocHB.gif)
![](http://i.imgur.com/EQpi0Am.gif)  
A location based iOS application to post&find personal chef information. The target of the application is to connect people with food.

### SimpleWeather
![](http://i.imgur.com/42cFxj9.png?2)
![](http://i.imgur.com/rCi2TLu.png?2)
![](http://i.imgur.com/W6IYZ9x.png?2)  
An application for displaying weather conditions of different locations.
Notify users when there's an update.  
TO-DO-LIST:
1. Support multiple locations.
2. Support off-line.
3. Better UI/UX.  
[[Repo]->SimpleWeather](https://github.com/guangyuwangg/SimpleWeather) 

### REAL-TIME-TRAINS
![](https://www.student.cs.uwaterloo.ca/~cs452/img/trains.jpg)
Worked in a team of 2 to create an operating system for a system-on-a-chip and
programed model trains to perform tasks based on the developed OS.  
[[Repo]->Real-Time-Train](https://github.com/guangyuwangg/REAL-TIME-TRAINS)  

### Tic-Tac-Toe
![](http://i.imgur.com/05026Zx.jpg?1?7269)  
A Tic-Tac-Toe game developed on Android by using the MVC architecture. Allow
two users to play the game and users can enter their names in the main screen to
identify themselves.  
[[Repo]->Tic-Tac-Toe](https://github.com/guangyuwangg/TicTacToe)

### FreedomLunch 
A Toronoto startup company which provides online food order service.
Used PHP and SQL queries to developed a small plugin for restaurant order query&display; 
Make use of open source framework OpenCart

### Skedular
An Android course project which allows users to register accounts and add courses to their accounts. The app will pull the course information (in XML format) from professor's website and use a parser to parse the information into dierent data objects. Use multi-threading to display animation when loading/writing data.  
[[Repo]->Skedular](https://github.com/guangyuwangg/Skedular)

### Patternizer
A small program implemented using Java. It can be used to create different kinds of patterns. 
Demo video provided by my prof: https://www.youtube.com/embed/qNdm6IZrbbg  
My program behaves exactly the same as the demo video does.  
[[Repo]->Patternizer](https://github.com/guangyuwangg/Patternizer)

### Lunar-Lander
A small game developed using C++ and xlib.
![](http://i.imgur.com/tme7Ji7.png?1?3035)  
[[Repo]->Lunar-Lander](https://github.com/guangyuwangg/Lunar-Lander)

### More?
[[Click here to view more!]](https://github.com/guangyuwangg?tab=repositories)
